## Block.setMutator() method

Give this block a mutator dialog.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setMutator(_mutator: Mutator): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_mutator | [Mutator](./blockly.mutator.md) | A mutator dialog instance or null to remove. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
